meanings.sent1: The juice was unmixed with water, making it very strong.
meanings.sent2: The paint colors remained unmixed, showing their true vibrancy.
meanings.sent3: She preferred her coffee unmixed, without any cream or sugar.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty to the team was unmixed, unwavering through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The unmixed emotions on her face revealed her true feelings.

meanings.sent1: The unmixed gold shone brightly in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The singer's voice was so powerful and unmixed with autotune.
meanings.sent3: The cake was a delight, with its unmixed flavors bursting in every bite.
meanings.sent4: Her unmixed joy at the news was contagious, spreading smiles all around.
meanings.sent5: The unmixed truth finally came out, revealing the whole story.
